meanings.definition: A device for measuring distance traveled.
meanings.sent1: The odograph on the car dashboard showed how far we had driven.
meanings.sent2: I used the odograph to track the distance I walked each day.
meanings.sent3: The odograph decided to take a break after counting all the steps.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like an odograph, always calculating the distance between us.
meanings.sent5: The odograph beeped happily as it recorded the miles traveled.

meanings.definition: A chart or graph showing distance traveled over time.
meanings.sent1: The odograph displayed a clear line graph of our journey.
meanings.sent2: I studied the odograph to see how our progress changed over time.
meanings.sent3: The odograph graph looked like a rollercoaster with all its ups and downs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile followed a trajectory like an odograph, rising and falling with each moment.
meanings.sent5: The odograph charted our adventure in a way that words never could.
